title: Google\Cloud\Run\V2\BinaryAuthorization
name: BinaryAuthorization
description:
Settings for Binary Authorization feature.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.run.v2.BinaryAuthorization

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.use_default
params.description: If True, indicates to use the default project's binary authorization policy. If False, binary authorization will be disabled.

params.name: data.breakglass_justification
params.description: If present, indicates to use Breakglass using this justification. If use_default is False, then it must be empty. For more information on breakglass, see https://cloud.google.com/binary-authorization/docs/using-breakglass

methods.name: getUseDefault
methods.description:
